titles.title: O Love Who Ere Life's Earlist Dawn (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Love who ere life's earliest dawn On me Thy choice hast gently laid O love who here as man wast born And wholly like to us wast made O Love I give myself to Thee Thine ever only Thine to be{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Love who once in time wast slain Pierced through and through with bitter woe O love who wrestling thus didst gain That we eternal joy might know O Love I give myself to Thee Thine ever only Thine to be{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Love of whom is truth and light The Word and Spirit life and power Whose heart was bared to them that smite To shield us in our trial hour O Love I give myself to Thee Thine ever only Thine to be{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Love who thus hast bound me fast Beneath the gentle yoke of Thine Love who hast conquered me at last And rapt away this heart of mine O Love I give myself to Thee Thine ever only Thine to be{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Love who lovest me for aye Who for my soul dost ever plead O Love who didst my ransom pay Whose power sufficeth in my stead O Love I give myself to Thee Thine ever only thine to be{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Love who once shalt bid me rise Form out this dying life of ours O Love who once o'er yonder skies Shalt set me in the fadeless bowers O Love I give myself to Thee Thine ever only Thine to be{/lang-eng}
